name: AGIHAS – SUPPORT GROUP for PEOPLE LIVING WITH HIV/AIDS
goal:
1/providing social and psychological support to those living with AIDS/HIV and their relatives;
2/ensuring human rights and legal protection for HIV/AIDS patients, integrating them into society;
3/improving HIV/AIDS patient quality of life and advocating it in the government institutions;
4/limiting the spread of HIV infection and AIDS epidemic through political lobbying, aggressive fostering of ARV treatment access, drug pricing controls, and ongoing insistence on adoption of latest WHO HIV/AIDS treatment guidelines and ECDC policies;
5/advocating the wellbeing, health of HIV positive mothers and their infants;
6/cementing a sustainable Pan-European network of partner organizations, not limited to AIDS Action Europe, clinicians, and other stakeholders, working in the field of HIV and HEP C/ HIV co-infection;
7/working with other HIV/AIDS partner organizations and Latvian Infectology Centre on drafting HIV policy documentation.
interests: Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Youth
